infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app uses Apple Health to track your workouts and fitness progress.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app saves workout data to Apple Health to help you track your fitness journey.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your calendar to schedule workout reminders and track your training schedule.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app uses reminders to help you stay on track with your fitness goals.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to record exercise videos for AI-powered form analysis and technique improvement.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to analyze exercise videos and provide form feedback.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app may record audio with exercise videos for complete workout analysis.
